Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    MainCLI
    Class responsible to manage the CLI
    ModelInterpreterCLI
    Class responsible for the application of the updates to the viewables sent by the model.
    ScreenCLI
    A ScreenCLI is responsible for showing to the user the right information, and for receiving from the user the commands.
    View
    Collection of Viewable(s) to be shown on screen at the same time.
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    ViewableId
    List of the id of the Viewable(s)
